brand_summary.style_keywords: Scandinavian minimalism clean geometric professional Nordic

instagram_prompts.gemini_prompt:
Create a 1080×1080px Instagram post using this exact specification:

BACKGROUND: Clean white background with subtle geometric elements in Nordic turquoise accents
TYPOGRAPHY: Inter font throughout
MAIN HEADLINE: "Transform Your Digital Strategy" in bold dark charcoal at 56px, positioned in upper third
SUPPORTING TEXT: "23+ years helping Fortune 500 companies strengthen their online presence and create meaningful business impact" in medium gray at 20px, centered below headline
BRAND ELEMENT: Minimalist geometric shape in professional teal as subtle accent
STYLE: Scandinavian minimalism aesthetic with abundant white space, clean lines, and professional Nordic feel
SPACING: 80px padding on all sides for mobile readability
EFFECTS: Subtle shadow on key elements

Design emphasizes strategic expertise and professional credibility with clean, geometric Scandinavian design principles.

Create a 1080×1080px Instagram post using this exact specification:

BACKGROUND: Soft off-white background with minimal geometric pattern in Nordic turquoise
TYPOGRAPHY: Inter font throughout
MAIN HEADLINE: "Create Meaningful Work" in bold dark charcoal at 52px, positioned centrally
SUPPORTING TEXT: "Brand Platform Development • Digital Strategy • Technology Advisory" in professional teal at 18px, spaced below headline
SECONDARY TEXT: "Independent advisory across brand, communication, strategy, and technology" in medium gray at 16px
STYLE: Clean Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic with geometric shapes and abundant white space
SPACING: 90px padding on all sides for optimal mobile viewing
EFFECTS: Subtle outlined icons in Nordic turquoise color, minimal drop shadows

Design reflects Danish design philosophy with focus on functionality, simplicity, and purposeful communication.

Create a 1080×1080px Instagram post using this exact specification:

BACKGROUND: Pure white with subtle linear gradient accent from professional teal to darker Nordic turquoise
TYPOGRAPHY: Inter font throughout
MAIN HEADLINE: "Strengthen Your Digital Presence" in bold dark charcoal at 50px, top positioning
KEY METRICS: "C25 • Fortune 500 • Unicorns • SMEs" in professional teal at 24px bold
SUPPORTING TEXT: "Reduce pseudowork, accelerate market entry, create business impact" in medium gray at 18px
BRAND MARK: Minimal geometric element in Nordic turquoise as visual anchor
STYLE: Scandinavian minimalism with clean lines, geometric shapes, and purposeful use of white space
SPACING: 85px padding ensuring mobile-first readability
EFFECTS: Crisp typography hierarchy with subtle geometric accents

Design communicates premium consulting expertise through refined Nordic aesthetic and strategic messaging hierarchy.
